name: Rothschild (Robusto)
additionalNotes:
This may be a re-blend of the PI "core line", but information on the internet is scarce.  This is a different blend than the Core Line, according to the page for this one at CI. There is a four year gap between reviews of the core line in 2016 and then some more in 2020 which might indicate that this one wasn't made during that time.  
https://www.cigarsinternational.com/p/puros-indios-cigars/1411836/#p-62795
